articles.author: Helen Regan
articles.title: Europe scrambles to rearm as Trump threatens security guarantees and Russian threat looms. Here’s what to know - CNN
articles.description: European leaders have vowed to rearm the continent at historic emergency talks held after the United States threatened to rip up 80 years of security guarantees over the trajectory of Russia’s war in Ukraine.
articles.content: European leaders have vowed to rearm the continent at historic emergency talks held after the United States threatened to rip up 80 years of security guarantees over the trajectory of Russias war in … [+6146 chars]
